metadata.title: Thursday, 20th September, 2018
metadata.session: THIRD SESSION OF THE TWELFTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Housing and Infrastructure Development
questions.section: QUESTIONS FOR ORAL ANSWER (STANDING ORDER NO. 30)
parts: (a) when the construction of the Kamphemba Bridge in Chama North Parliamentary Constituency will commence;
(b) what has caused the delay in commencing the project; and
(c) what the time frame for the completion of the project is.

questions.section: QUESTIONS FOR ORAL ANSWER (STANDING ORDER NO. 30)
parts: (a) which company was contracted to supply dredgers in 2015;
(b) what the contract sum was;
(c) what the total number of dredgers to be supplied was;
(d) how many dredgers were supplied as of July, 2018;
(e) to which areas the dredgers have been allocated; and
(f) if none has been supplied, why.

questions.minister: Minister of Housing and Infrastructure Development
questions.section: QUESTIONS FOR ORAL ANSWER (STANDING ORDER NO. 30)
parts: (a) when the upgrading of school infrastructure at Nkosha Secondary School in Kaputa Parliamentary Constituency will be completed;
(b) how much money has so far been spent on the project; and
(c) what the total number of teachers  deployed to the school was as of 30th June, 2018.

questions.section: QUESTIONS FOR ORAL ANSWER (STANDING ORDER NO. 30)
parts: (a) why the construction of a health centre in Kakombo area near Chief Shakumbila’s Palace in Nangoma Parliamentary Constituency has stalled;
(b) when the construction will resume; and
(c) what the time frame for the completion of the project is.

questions.section: QUESTIONS FOR ORAL ANSWER (STANDING ORDER NO. 30)
parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to rehabilitate the following Primary Schools in Milenge District:
(i) Mapula; and (ii) Sokontwe;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented; and
(c) if there are no such plans, why.

questions.section: QUESTIONS FOR ORAL ANSWER (STANDING ORDER NO. 30)
parts: (a) which province produced the highest amount of milk between January, 2017 and June, 2018; and
(b) what measures the Government is taking to improve milk production in provinces with low production.

questions.minister: Minister of Commerce, Trade and Industry
questions.section: QUESTIONS FOR ORAL ANSWER (STANDING ORDER NO. 30)
parts: (a) how many solar powered hammer mills were allocated to the following Districts:
(i) Kaputa; (ii) Chimbamilonga; and (iii) Nsama;
(b) how many hammer mills have been installed and were operational as of 30th June, 2018 in each District; and

(c) when the installation of the remaining hammer mills will be completed. ORDER OF THE DAY 1. Thanks - His Excellency the President’s Address - Motion (18th September) - Resumption of Debate: (Mr Kamboni, MP)
